DataElement.preferredName: Physical Exercise Performance Activity Average Days Per Week Temporal Frequency
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The number of days per week spent in the performance of physical activity as practiced in recreation, amateur and professional sports, or planned activity to improve physical condition or health.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Performance of physical activity as practiced in recreation, amateur and professional sports, or planned activity to improve physical condition or health.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Of or pertaining to the body.:physical activity as practiced in recreation, amateur and professional sports, or planned activity to improve physical condition or health.

Concepts.definition: Having substance or material existence; concerned with material things; of or pertaining to the body as distinguished from the mind or spirit.
physical activity as practiced in recreation, amateur and professional sports, or planned activity to improve physical condition or health.

Property.preferredDefinition: Performance; process or manner of functioning or operating.

Concepts.definition: A manner of functioning or operating.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Activity Average Days Per Week Temporal Frequency
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The number of occurrences of something within a given time period.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.: Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.: A natural number greater than 1 and less than 3 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of one and one.: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
